---
title: "protocol_26"
---

Protocol_26.m  - test different curtain stimuli. 32 pixels instead of 16.
cond 1 = binary on
cond 2 = binary off
cond 3 = greyscale ON
cond 4 = greyscale OFF
20s interval
30s trial duration - 2x trials

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 4 |
| Patterns Used | 6 |
| t_acclim_start | 30s |
| t_acclim_end | 30s |
| t_interval | 20s |
| t_flash | 5s |
| t_pause | 0.01 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 51](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_51.qmd) | 127 | 15s | ON - 32px - binary - 1-0 |
| 2 | [Pattern 52](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_52.qmd) | 127 | 15s | OFF - 32 px - binary - 1-0 |
| 3 | [Pattern 56](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_56.qmd) | 127 | 15s | ON - 32px - greyscale - 4-0 |
| 4 | [Pattern 55](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_55.qmd) | 127 | 15s | OFF - 32px - greyscale - 4-0 |
